entry.title: Rabbit in Your Headlights
entry.summary:
Author: KatsatheGraceling

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,044Chapters: 15/17Kudos: 2,737

Summary: “Stiles?” Allison’s voice was frantic over the phone.Stiles immediately jolted upright in bed, clutching the cell close to his ear. “Allison? What’s the matter?”“Something’s wrong with Scott. I don’t—please, he’s acting—” she cut herself off.“Acting like what?” There was no answer. “Allison, like what?”“Possessed,” she whispered.  AU where Stiles was always a demon, and Scott is the one who gets possessed by the Nogitsune. Stiles is not happy about it.

entry.title: my blood never tasted like wine
entry.summary:
Author: Melpomene (Aconitehart)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,169Chapters: 5/10Kudos: 301

Summary: Peter looks up and frowns. "I'm busy, nephew."Shit. Stiles peeks over his shoulder and, sure enough, there's Derek Hale. Dark hair, pale eyes, stubble carefully sculpted and contoured. He looks older now, more solid, with a hint of grey at his temples.  He's wearing a suit, like every other mobster werewolf in existence. Stiles stares, open-mouthed, for a moment before he realises that Derek is glaring at him. Mortified, he turns away, his heart banging against his rib cage."Ah, that's right," Peter says, lazily waving a hand. "You two are already acquainted."That's not really how Stiles would put it, but he keeps his mouth shut. He stares down at his hands, feeling Derek's gaze boring holes through him."The Stilinski kid is here looking for work?" Derek asks, sounding almost disgusted. "He's going to be dancing here?""I feel like a broken record," Stiles snaps, twisting around to look at Derek again. "For the last time, all of my clothes are staying on. I'm not going to writhe around a stripper pole to entertain a bunch of wolves. But I can mix drinks and serve cocktails, okay? That's what I want to do."

entry.title: Of All The Names I Gave You, My Favourite One is MINE!
entry.summary:
Author: NiklausScratchIII

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,592Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 148

Summary: Stiles is the new wolf in town, on the run from something he's not ready to face. Derek is a new single parent, and has no idea what he's doing, but hes doing his best dammit. A desperate moment finds the two wolves forging a unplanned bond that might just heal them both. Will their vastly different needs find a way to align, or is a neighbor wolf just a neighbor wolf at the end of the day.orDerek is drowning in single parenthood. Stiles loves babies. Derek might be ready for love even if it's not ready for him. Stiles has a dark past and big secret. And Eli...hes just a baby.

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,923Chapters: 13/75Kudos: 19

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: Where Ashes Lies
entry.summary:
Author: TendreChaos

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,915Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Stiles has always known there was something inside him the world learned to fear. Something that made him different.In the ashes of a fractured society where the supernatural is feared, sorcerers like him are branded as threats, locked behind iron gates, stripped of names and freedom, buried under numbers and silence. Wounded and half-starved, Stiles escapes the concrete prison that once held him and vanishes into the wild ruins beyond civilization’s reach.There, hidden in the bones of the old world, he finds a rebel enclave, scarred souls and restless fire, a flicker of resistance in a land gone cold. But trust is a fragile thing in a world built on betrayal, and Stiles carries a secret, a power he barely understands, a part of himself he cannot share.Because if they knew the truth, if they knew what he really was...They wouldn’t hate the cage he escaped from.They’d build a stronger one.

entry.title: it's just a curve upon the lips, the hips
entry.summary:
Author: scribespirare

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,422Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 46

Summary: Derek was going to kill Stiles, he really was.The kid was a high school student who’d wanted a job that fit around his schedule, and Derek had needed a new open baker from the hours of four to seven am. It had seemed like a good fit in the beginning.Until a week ago, anyway. Because that was when Stiles had transitioned from listening to music in the kitchen, to gay audio erotica. And Derek couldn’t even fucking call him out on it because he was using a single earbud to indulge his literary fantasies. Nobody with regular human hearing would have a single clue what the kid was up to, so Derek had to pretend he didn’t either. It was hell.

entry.title: Demon on His Shoulders
entry.summary:
Author: Mekanamin02

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,237Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 49

Summary: Loner demon lord, Derek Hale just wants a quiet day to himself. One day, is all he asks. But one moment he's at home and the next he's standing in front of a frail old lady jumping to make a demon deal with him. He REALLY doesn't want to accept the deal but... circumstances. So now he's inserting himself into the life of a certain Stiles Stilinski to play his part but perhaps this will be a deal of Derek's millennia-long existence that he will never forget.~*~An unstoppable scream wrenches its way out of the demon as the feeling overpowers every sense in his body. He knows he’s gripping the woman’s arm too tightly, but he can’t seem to care when it feels like his core is igniting from within.Somewhere on the other side of the county, a boy gasps awake beside a hospital bed. There’s beeping behind him, loud, counting down. He sighs and stands, rolls his heavy shoulders and got to work, not realising he has a demon riding on his shoulders now. A demon his grandmother traded her life to protect him.

entry.summary:
Author: amatorial

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,165Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 17

Summary: Derek was smiling—excited, rare, and real in a way Stiles hadn’t seen in years. That was all it took. He followed him into the woods, chasing that warmth like it might slip away.But something else came back with him.Now there’s something in the dark. It watches. It waits. entry.title: Stilinski-Hale Family
entry.summary:
Author: Marc_is_weird_af

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,853Chapters: 25/25Kudos: 866

Summary: Stiles and Derek weren't counting on getting a child so soon in their relationship. They wanted to wait until after they got married, yet here they were with a 1yr old just over a month after their engagement. Stiles should've known better than to voice his wishes in a forest. Seriously he cannot catch a break.ORA recount of events from Stiles and Derek getting Eli, up to Eli sneaking into Beacon Hills after his 15th birthday.Just family shenanigans and how everyone came to find out about the boy.

entry.title: i've known the warmth of your doorways
entry.summary:
Author: buttercup_beetle

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,500Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 50

Summary: “Hey babe,” he gasps.“Hi,” Derek replies. He’s got blood smeared all over his arms, and down his bare chest. From the wetness splattered on his own face, Stiles suspects that he’s not much better.“Rough day?”Derek cracks a bare smile. A glint of his fang peeks out from his lips. “You could say that.”Stiles sighs, wipes his filthy hands on his soiled jeans, and rolls up to his knees. “I’ll go get the body bag from the trunk,” he says, and Derek nods. “Then, you can explain to me what the hell just happened.”
